scripts.start:mobile-app: cd app && ionic capacitor run android -l --external
scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend\Proppy.API && dotnet ef database update
scripts.backend:reset: cd backend\Proppy.API && dotnet ef database update 0
scripts.backend:migrate:add: cd backend\Proppy.API && dotnet ef migrations add
scripts.build:android: cd app && ionic cap copy android
